item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔在芝加哥经济俱乐部发表讲话
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔摄影师：阿尔-德拉戈/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Jerome Powell Photographer: Al Drago/Bloomberg】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称美国关税引发中国就业担忧
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对中国征收的关税不断攀升，加剧了世界第二大经济体家庭对就业、收入增长和投资损失的担忧。【原文：Skyrocketing tariffs imposed on China by US President Donald Trump have pushed up concerns about jobs, income growth and investment losses among households in the world’s second-biggest economy, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 法国为新兴氢能产业提供新支持
item.description: 在一系列项目受挫之后，法国宣布将为氢能产业提供新的支持。【原文：France unveiled new support for the hydrogen industry after a series of project setbacks cast doubt on a fuel billed as critical to reaching net zero.】

item.title: 一个数据点预示着美国劳动力市场正在出现问题
item.description: 美国劳工统计局周三公布的数据分析显示，2 月份美国有 14 个州的失业人数超过了职位空缺数，创 2021 年 4 月以来之最。【原文：The number of unemployed people exceeded job openings in 14 US states in February, the most since April 2021, according to an analysis of Bureau of Labor Statistics data released Wednesday.】

item.title: 前美国国家安全局局长希望他能吸引 DEFCON 黑客群
item.description: 2023年3月8日星期三，美国华盛顿，美国国家安全局（NSA）局长保罗-中曾根（Paul Nakasone）在参议院情报委员会听证会上与联邦调查局（FBI）局长克里斯托弗-雷（Christopher Wray）（左）一起发言。美国情报机构坚持认为，尽管在可信度上存在一些分歧，但在Covid-19病毒的起源问题上仍未达成共识，共和党人试图以此作为反对拜登政府的政治砝码。【原文：Paul Nakasone, director of the National Security Agency (NSA), speaks during a Senate Intelligence Committee hearing with Christopher Wray, director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), left, in Washington, DC, US, on Wednesday, March 8, 2023. US intelligence agencies maintain there's still no consensus on the origins of the Covid-19 virus, despite some differences in confidence levels that Republicans have sought to use as political cudgel against the Biden administration.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈马克认为有充分理由保持利率稳定
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，在关税和其他政策变化对经济的影响更加明朗之前，官员们有充分理由将利率维持在当前水平。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said there is good reason for officials to hold interest rates at current levels until there is more clarity on how tariffs and other policy changes will affect the economy.】

item.title: 扎克伯格在反垄断庭审中表示，Meta 将 TikTok 视为 "高度紧迫 "的威胁
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）在联邦贸易委员会的反垄断审判中第三天作证时表示，字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）的 TikTok 在 2018 年刚刚兴起时，对 Meta Platforms 公司构成了 "高度紧迫的 "竞争威胁。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg said that ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok posed a “highly urgent” competitive threat to Meta Platforms Inc. when it first sprang up in 2018, as he testified for a third day in the Federal Trade Commission’s antitrust trial.】

item.title: 中国如何抵御特朗普的贸易战
item.description:
在本期特朗普经济学节目中，经济学家努里埃尔-鲁比尼（Nouriel Roubini）解释了中国政府吸收经济打击—和反击的各种工具。【原文：

On this episode of Trumponomics, economist Nouriel Roubini explains the various tools Beijing has to absorb economic blows—and strike back. 

】

item.title: 纽约银行称，弱势美元是长期投资者的买点
item.description: 纽约银行（BNY）的数据显示，美元跌至六个月低点开始成为长期投资者的买入机会。【原文：The dollar’s slide to a six-month low is starting to look like a buying opportunity to long-term investors, data from BNY shows.】

item.title: 撒哈拉沙尘吹袭德国，将抑制太阳能输出
item.description: 未来几天，一股撒哈拉沙尘将抑制欧洲中部和南部部分地区的太阳能发电，从而在中午前后对电价形成支撑。【原文：A plume of Saharan dust is set to curb solar generation in parts of central and southern Europe in the coming days, adding support to power prices around midday.】

item.title: PSG 称，不友好政策可能会削弱南非的吸引力
item.description: 南非最大的资产管理公司之一的负责人说，南非正在通过采取不利于商业的政策，将潜在投资者拒之门外。【原文：South Africa is turning potential investors off by adopting policies that are hostile to business, the head of one of country’s largest asset managers said.】

item.title: 可再生燃料公司全球清洁能源公司申请破产
item.description: 全球清洁能源控股公司（Global Clean Energy Holdings Inc.【原文：Global Clean Energy Holdings Inc., a publicly traded renewable fuels producer, has filed bankruptcy with a plan that hands control of the business to its lenders and engineering firm CTCI Americas Inc.】

item.title: 与原油价格息息相关的新兴市场债务被石油套牢
item.description: 能源价格下跌正在挤压发展中国家的石油生产公司和国家的债券，因为投资者正准备应对一场看不到尽头的全球贸易战所带来的连锁反应。【原文：Falling energy prices are squeezing the bonds of oil-producing companies and countries throughout the developing world, as investors brace for the knock-on effects of a global trade war with no end in sight.】

item.title: 在税收抗议和特朗普关税之后，肯尼亚寻求国际货币基金组织的现实协议
item.description: 在因税收和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易征税引发致命抗议之后，肯尼亚政府一位高级官员表示，肯尼亚正在与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）合作的新项目中寻求现实的目标。【原文：Kenya is seeking realistic targets in a new program with the International Monetary Fund, according to a top government official, following deadly protests over taxes and US President Donald Trump’s trade levies.】

item.title: 帕克兰首席执行官在最大投资者压力下下台
item.description: 帕克兰公司（Parkland Corp. ）表示，首席执行官鲍勃-埃斯佩（Bob Espey）将卸任，因为这家燃料分销商正面临来自其最大股东的越来越大的压力，要求其对业务和治理进行全面改革。【原文：Parkland Corp. said Chief Executive Officer Bob Espey will step down as the fuel distributor comes under mounting pressure from its largest shareholder to undergo sweeping changes to its business and governance.】

item.title: 汽车租赁初创公司 Turo 首次公开募股受挫后裁员 15
item.description: 汽车租赁初创公司Turo Inc.在撤回首次公开募股计划后，将裁员约150人。【原文：Car-rental startup Turo Inc. is cutting about 150 jobs after withdrawing plans for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 布朗大学在资金受到威胁的情况下申请 3 亿美元贷款
item.description: 本月早些时候，布朗大学获得了一笔 3 亿美元的贷款，因为常春藤联盟学校正面临联邦政府冻结资金的威胁。【原文：Brown University entered into a $300 million loan earlier this month as Ivy League schools contend with threats from the federal government to freeze funding.】

item.title: 匈牙利大亨就化肥公司问题与债权人摊牌
item.description: 匈牙利最富有的企业家之一拉斯洛-比格（Laszlo Bige）正与他的化肥企业的债权人僵持不下，因为该公司面临着迫在眉睫的债务期限。【原文：Laszlo Bige, one of Hungary’s wealthiest entrepreneurs, is in a standoff with creditors of his fertilizer business as the company faces imminent debt deadlines.】

item.title: 肯-格里芬以 1,590 万美元的总价售出两套芝加哥公寓
item.description: 亿万富翁 Citadel 创始人肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）又出售了他在芝加哥的两套公寓，交易总额达 1,590 万美元。【原文：Billionaire Citadel founder Ken Griffin has sold two more of his Chicago condos in transactions totaling $15.9 million.】

item.title: 泄漏导致管道关闭后，Keystone 重新启动石油管道
item.description: Keystone 石油管道的运营商将管道重新投入使用，结束了因北达科塔州农村地区发生约 3,500 桶泄漏而造成的长达一周的停运。【原文：The operator of the Keystone oil pipeline brought the conduit back into service, putting an end to a week-long outage caused by an estimated 3,500-barrel spill in rural North Dakota.】

item.title: 特朗普的世界自由基金会与 DWF 实验室签署加密货币协议
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的加密货币项目 "世界自由金融"（World Liberty Financial）又签下了一个新的合作伙伴：这家做市商曾被媒体报道指控从事操纵性交易活动。【原文：President Donald Trump’s crypto project World Liberty Financial has signed a new partner: A market maker that has been accused in press reports of manipulative trading activity.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心回升但关税影响前景
item.description: 尽管需求预期跌至一年多以来的低点，而且建筑材料价格因关税提高而攀升，但本月美国住宅建筑商的信心因当前销售回升而勉强上升。【原文：US homebuilder confidence barely rose this month on a pickup in current sales, though demand expectations stumbled to a more than one-year low and prices of construction materials are climbing on the heels of higher tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普限制向中国出口芯片，芯片制造商领跌科技股
item.description: 周三上午，科技股领跌，原因是英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）和先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Technology stocks led losses Wednesday morning after Nvidia Corp. and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. said President Donald Trump’s administration has curbed the export of its chips to China, while ASML Holding NV offered a disappointing earnings report.】

item.title: KKR 探讨以 100 亿美元出售大西洋航空公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，KKR & Co. 公司正在权衡大西洋航空公司的各种选择，包括可能出售这家私人飞机固定基地运营商，估值约为 100 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co. is weighing options for Atlantic Aviation, including a potential sale that could value the private jet fixed base operator at about $10 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率维持在 2.75%，寻求关税问题的进一步澄清
item.description: 加拿大央行暂停了降息周期，并重申决策者在等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策如何成形时 "将谨慎行事"。【原文：The Bank of Canada paused its interest rate cutting cycle and reiterated that policymakers “will proceed carefully” as they wait to see how US President Donald Trump’s trade policy takes shape.】

item.title: 加拿大银行预计全面贸易战将导致长达一年的经济衰退
item.description: 加拿大央行试图预测全球关税战的结果，这是两个经济体的故事：加拿大经济活动的暂时停滞或持续一年的彻底衰退。【原文：It’s a tale of two economies for the Bank of Canada as it tries to predict outcomes of a global tariff war: a temporary stall in Canadian activity or an outright downturn that lasts a year.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"的石油配额补偿努力仍显脆弱
item.description: 在欧佩克+再次推动成员国为破坏石油配额而赎罪之际，最新数据显示，它们在这方面的记录一如既往地糟糕。【原文：As OPEC+ makes yet another push for members to atone for busting their oil quotas, the latest data show their record of doing so is as bad as ever.】

item.title: 钢铁、铝制品制造商的财报将揭示特朗普关税的影响
item.description: 当全球最大的铝和钢铁制造商公布第一季度财报时，投资者希望这些财报能提供一个窗口，让他们了解唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税措施在未来一年将如何波及整个行业。【原文：When the world’s biggest aluminum- and steel-makers report first-quarter earnings, investors are hoping they’ll offer a window into how President Donald Trump’s tariff measures will ripple through the industry in the coming year.】

item.title: 动荡打破高等级债券销售计划，零交易日激增
item.description: 预计今年美国公司将再出售近 1 万亿美元的高等级债券，而由于关税政策的变化刺激了市场动荡，这些销售的时机选择比往年更加困难。【原文：Companies are expected to sell nearly another $1 trillion of high-grade bonds in the US this year, and timing those sales is harder than it’s been in years, as tariff policy changes spur market turmoil.】
